Hashtagify.name: Hashtagify
Hashtagify.description: Hashtagify is the most advanced Twitter and Instagram Hashtags tracking tool. It allows you to find the best hashtags to reach your audience, gives you custom suggestions, and helps you getting to know your influencers and competitors better.

Iconosquare.name: Iconosquare
Iconosquare.description: Iconosquare is the leading analytics and management suite for Instagram. Since 2011, Iconosquare has empowered social media marketers, influencers and brands to grow their Instagram audience and measure their performance on Instagram.

Osintgram.name: Osintgram
Osintgram.description: Osintgram is a OSINT tool on Instagram. It offers an interactive shell to perform analysis on Instagram account of any users by its nickname.

Picodash.name: Picodash
Picodash.description: Picodash is a web-based Instagram analytics tool that provides insights on Instagram accounts.

Sterra.name: Sterra
Sterra.description: Sterra is a Python library for Instagram data scraping.

Toutatis.name: Toutatis
Toutatis.description: Toutatis is a Python library for Instagram data scraping.
